page.title: 19Wroxall Manor Farm
page.content: {The farm is 3000 years old.}One of the barns was built in Roman times. On the side of the barn is a arched window. The farmer has lots of animals. He has 200 sheep and 100 cows. The cows are milked twice a day. In May the sheep are shorn. There is one sheepdog which is 2 years old. There are 600 acres of land, and 100 acres of waste land. The crops are Wheat, Barley, Oats and Peas. 200 tons of Barley, 500 tons of Wheat, 50 tons of Oats and 100 tons of peas are harvested each year. The fields are 200 years old. The farmer has a tractor, a crop sprayer and a combine harvester. He has a vegetable garden at the back of the farm, where he grows carrots and potatoes. He has two horses they are brown and black. The farmer has lived at the farm for 10 years and farmed for 30 years.
